```{r}
set.seed(13435)
X <- data.frame("var1"=sample(1:5), 
                "var2"=sample(6:10),
                "var3"=sample(11:15))

X <- X[sample(1:5), ]
X$var2[c(1,3)] = NA
X


X[1,]
X[,"var1"] # quotes!
X[c(1,2), "var1"]


# Logicals
X[X$var1 <= 3 & X$var3 > 11, ]
X[X$var1 <= 3 | X$var3 > 15, ]
```
